text: Toulon is a city in the south of France. It has about 170,000 people. Toulon is the prefecture of Var. Toulon is the third biggest city of the region Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur after Marseille and Nice. It is the main base of the Mediterranean Sea fleet of the French Navy. It is from the Italian border. == Education == * Kedge Business School == More reading == * Le Chevallier à découvert, Jean-Pierre Thiollet, Laurens Ed., 1998. == Other websites ==
title: Toulon
